creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: extreme close-up of orange flower: bright red curving blocks of color at L and R arc up to meet orange, yellow, and light green swirling colors at center and ULQ; light green details near center
inscription: Left: [1954年作　ナスターション] {1954 nen saku, Nasutaashon}; bottom, in pencil: [Nasturtium] [Fujio Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Nasturtium
